name: Robo's Adventure
description:
Loading may take a minute(literally) but it will Load! A short 2D Platformer Game about saving your Girlfriend for the  Lost Relic Games - GAME JAM

Controlls:

A - Move Left

D - Move Right

W/Space - Jump after releasing the button

Left Shift - Hold to Run

to Attack Swing your Mace fast and hit the enemies
